amendment.description: Amendment is the reported version of the bill, House Report 118-8 as reported by the Committee on House Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steil amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Steil.

Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Steil amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
